expo.name: VibeChat
expo.description: Making group chats great again. Your friend group chats with custom ChatGPT in them.

infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to your calendar to create and manage event reminders for your group chats.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: VibeChat needs to add events to your calendar for group chat scheduling.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: VibeChat needs full calendar access to create and manage event reminders for your group chats.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to reminders to help you keep track of important group events.
infoPlist.NSRemindersFullAccessUsageDescription: VibeChat needs full reminders access to create and manage tasks for your group chats.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to your photos to let you save and share them.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: VibeChat needs permission to save images to your gallery.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to your camera to let you take photos and videos to share in chats.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to your microphone for Vibe Calls and voice messages.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to your contacts to help you find and invite friends.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to your location to attach location data to your photos and videos.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow VibeChat to access your camera
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow VibeChat to access your microphone
